text: The customer service at this location is terrible. I placed an online order for this location rather than the Oxford location on accident. I called the New Albany Store directly to try to speak to someone about canceling my order. I was ‚Ä¶More

name: John Martin
text: While traveling home with my family, we stopped in New Albany for the night. Pizza Hut was an easy walk from our hotel and after 10 hours in the car, no one wanted to drive anywhere for dinner. So glad we chose Pizza Hut. The staff was great and very attentive. I wouldn't hesitate eating here again.

name: Justin Johnson
text: Came in and was told to take a seat wherever we liked. Nobody came to get our drinks. Had to find someone to give us menus and get our drinks. Placed an order for our drinks, but nobody brought them or came back. Eventually just left.

text: When I call in an order it is cooked perfect every time

text: Great pizza on the buffet and the most courteous staff.

text: Got there and it was hot as hell in there.  Service was ok up until the second glass of tea was hot as the room. The pizza was burnt.  And the flies stayed with us the whole visit.  So probably won't make arrangements to eat there again!!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Raj Patel
text: 4 of us dine-in for lunch. Best service we ever had. Very friendly staff specially Chelsea she had her FIRST DAY at Pizza Hut. She was very quick on taking orders and bring pizza üçï on table. We will say good luck to her on this job. We hope Pizza Hut will keep her forever.üëç

text: If you go her use CASH don't use card they will copy your card and you'll get out of state transactions I had to cancel my card I will never be eating here again.

name: Vince Maxey
text: I dont see how you can only have 1 delivery driver. That can't deliver pizza. And the replacement for this driver isnt coming in for 2 hours. This isnt the first time this has happened. And if your smart you'll just order from dominos.

name: Kelly Matney
text: Sticky tables, disgusting shakers for salt/pepper, parm, and chili flakes. Wooden blinds on windows were covered in dust. Tables sat unbused for over 60 minutes. Also there was a huge leak in the ceiling dropping discolored water all over the salad bar. Avoid this place at all costs. Staff was polite.

text: This is the worst Pizza Hut I've ever experienced. They are always out of something. I would have dealt with it and not written this review if it hadn't been for the fact that I placed an order 45 minutes ago for delivery that had an ‚Ä¶More

text: They say they got delivery and when I call and say may I please get a delivery the woman says "I don't have a driver" and hangs up on me when I clearly was going to order a pick up. No wonder the place is closing down .

text: From the unaccountably sticky floors to the faded and crooked hours sign, this place was just... sad. The highlight of the meal was the silverware,  which consisted of a solitary stamped metal fork wrapped in a napkin that looked like it ‚Ä¶More

text: I should've read the reviews before going here. Terrible service, even for take out customers! Part of order forgotten, so had to wait for it to be cooked. Very very dissappointed.

name: Sandra Dye
text: I ordered online and used the drive thru. I only had $100 bill and they informed me that I had to go get it broken to smaller bills. Wouldnt let me have my pizza until i left and came back. what is up with this. If you are a business you should be able to make change when someone is purchasing.
